external_games.name: Cross Ange: Rondo of Angels and Dragons tr.
Cross Ange: Rondo of Angels and Dragons tr.

name: Cross Ange: Rondo of Angels and Dragons tr.
summary: PlayStation Vita game based on the animated series "Cross Ange". The game is part Visual Novel, part Ace Combat where the player as part of "First Company" builds bonds with her squadmembers in the daytime and fights dragons by nighttime.
